author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Extends Coronavirus Guidelines to April 30
description: Trump predicted that by June 1, the United States would successfully be getting back to normal. | Politics
content:
President Donald Trump on Sunday said that guidelines for Americans fighting the coronavirus will be extended to April 30.
“Nothing would be worse than declaring victory before the victory is won, that would be the greatest loss of all,” Trump said, acknowle… [+1868 chars]
